Container.Name: xg2g
Container.Overview:
Ad-free, modern, self-hosted web player for Enigma2 (Dreambox/Vu+) receivers.
Features: - Modern React WebUI (Dark Mode) - HLS Streaming (Mobile compatible) - Timeshift (Rewind Live TV) - HDHomeRun Emulation (Plex/Jellyfin support)
**Configuration**: Set the 'Receiver URL' to your Enigma2 box IP.
(Note: If creating a config to bind port 80/443, manually add --cap-add=NET_BIND_SERVICE)
Container.Description: The Modern Web Player for Enigma2 receivers.

Config.Name: Receiver URL
Config.Description: URL of your Enigma2 receiver (e.g. http://192.168.1.5)

Config.Name: Bouquets
Config.Description: Comma separated list of Bouquets to load

Config.Name: API Token
Config.Description: Optional Bearer token for API security
